Disease.Name: GLUTAMATE FORMIMINOTRANSFERASE DEFICIENCY; FORMIMINOGLUTAMIC ACIDURIA (FIGLU)
Disease.Summary: very rare;autosomal recessive;mutation in the FTCD gene;- severe phenotype (;intellectual disability, megaloblastic anemia);- milder phenotype have been reported

symtomp.category: IMMUNE OR HEMATOLOGIC SYSTEM | LABORATORY FINDINGS

symtomp.symptom: no clinical symptoms (probably) / no clinical significance
